Penalty Challenge - Chrome Extension
Step up to the spot with Penalty Challenge, the exciting Chrome Extension that puts your shooting skills to the test!

Take aim and score as you face off against a virtual goalkeeper in thrilling penalty shootouts. With simple controls and realistic physics, every kick feels intense as you try to outsmart the keeper.

Whether playing solo or competing with friends, Penalty Challenge offers endless fun for soccer enthusiasts of all ages.

Download Penalty Challenge and start scoring goals today!
If you want to find more games press "Unblocked Games" button, we have a link for quick access to our website. Have fun!
